ValidationRule.description: Sales Team with the following profiles should close the opportunity only by Submit to Closing button
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT(SkipValidationRule__c),
ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing")) ), OR( $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - NA AE1", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - NA ENT", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - NA US AE2", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - NA US AE3", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - Connected Worker CPQ", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Industrial Sales - Field Services CPQ", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - Industrial Enterprise CPQ", $Profile.Name = "Salesforce Sales - CPQ Mexico", $Profile.Name = "Samsara Sales - Renewals - New System" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use the "Submit to Closing" button to submit this opportunity to closing.
